controller.Manager

    • comboHandler

      void comboHandler(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Handles the action events of the combo box in the "Add Toys" page. Determines which fields should be enabled or disabled based on the selected value in the combo box.
      Parameters:
      event - The action event triggered by the combo box.

    • addToy

      private boolean addToy(Long serialNum, String name, String brand, float price, int count, int age, String classification, String material, String size, String type, String minPS, String maxPS, String designers) throws MinPlayerException
      Adds a toy to the array list.
      Parameters:
      serialNum - The serial number of the toy.
      name - The name of the toy.
      brand - The brand of the toy.
      price - The price of the toy.
      count - The count of the toy.
      age - The age requirement of the toy.
      classification - The classification of the toy (for Figures).
      material - The material of the toy (for Animals).
      size - The size of the toy (for Animals).
      type - The type of the toy (for Puzzles).
      minPS - The minimum number of players (for BoardGames).
      maxPS - The maximum number of players (for BoardGames).
      designers - The designers of the toy (for BoardGames).
      Returns:
      true if the toy is added successfully
      Throws:
      MinPlayerException - If the minimum number of players is larger than the maximum number of players.

    • validateSerialNum

      private Boolean validateSerialNum(Long serialNum)
      This method is responsible for validating serial number when adding toys
      Returns:
      returns boolean if validated

    • validateToyPrice

      private boolean validateToyPrice(float price)
      This method is responsoble for validating toy prices based on user input
      Returns:
      returns boolean if validated

    • validateCount

      private boolean validateCount(int count)
      This method is responsoble for validating how much avalible stock a toy has based on user input
      Returns:
      returns boolean if validated

    • validateAge

      private boolean validateAge(int age)
      This method is responsible for validating minimum age of toy based on user input
      Returns:
      returns boolean if it is validated

    • validateAll

      private boolean validateAll(boolean serialNumC, boolean priceC, boolean countC, boolean ageC)
      Validates all the given boolean conditions and returns true if all are true.
      Parameters:
      serialNumC - a boolean representing the serial number condition
      priceC - a boolean representing the price condition
      countC - a boolean representing the count condition
      ageC - a boolean representing the age condition
      Returns:
      true if all the conditions are true, otherwise false
